NOTIFICATIONS = (('geoapp_created', 'App Created', 'A App was created'), ('geoapp_updated', 'App Updated', 'A App was updated'), ('geoapp_approved', 'App Approved', 'A App was approved by a Manager'), ('geoapp_published', 'App Published', 'A App was published'), ('geoapp_deleted', 'App Deleted', 'A App was deleted'), ('geoapp_rated', 'Rating for App', 'A rating was given to an App'))
